/** [Dp_SQL.xml][egovframework.example.dp.service.impl.DpMapper.selectBnServiceList][배너목록][hanq] */
SELECT BNNR_MNG_NO , SUBJ , BNNR_TP , CONCAT(DP_STRT_DT, ' ~ ', DP_END_DT) DP_GIGAN
, CASE WHEN NOW() BETWEEN DP_STRT_DT AND DATE_ADD(DP_END_DT, INTERVAL 1 DAY) THEN '진행중' WHEN NOW() < DP_STRT_DT THEN '대기중' WHEN NOW() > DATE_ADD(DP_END_DT, INTERVAL 1 DAY) THEN '마감' END STATUS
, BG_IMG_ATTC_FILE , DP_YN /**, REGR*/ , CA.ADMIN_NM AS REGR /**, DATE_FORMAT(DATE(REG_DT), "%Y. %m. %d") REG_DT*/ , DATE_FORMAT(DATE(DBM.REG_DT), "%Y. %m. %d") REG_DT , @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 RNUM /**, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_DP_BNNR_MNG) TOTAL_CNT*/ /**, (SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*) / {rows}) FROM T_DP_BNNR_MNG) TOTAL_PAGE*/ FROM T_DP_BNNR_MNG DBM LEFT JOIN CM_ADMIN CA ON DBM.REGR = CA.ADMIN_NO , (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R
AND ((DATE(DBM.DP_STRT_DT) > DATE(#{dpStrtDt})) AND (DATE(DBM.DP_STRT_DT) > DATE(#{dpEndDt})) OR (DATE(#{dpStrtDt}) > DATE(DBM.DP_END_DT)) AND (DATE(#{dpEndDt}) > DATE(DBM.DP_END_DT)))
AND DBM.DP_YN = #{srchDpYn}
AND SUBJ LIKE CONCAT('%', #{subj}, '%')
AND CA.ADMIN_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{subj}, '%')
AND (DBM.SUBJ LIKE CONCAT('%', #{subj}, '%') OR CA.ADMIN_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{subj}, '%'))

/** [Dp_SQL.xml][egovframework.example.dp.service.impl.DpMapper.selectBnMngServiceInfo][배너목록][hanq] */
SELECT SUBJ , DP_STRT_DT , DP_END_DT , DP_YN FROM T_DP_BNNR_MNG WHERE BNNR_MNG_NO = #{bnnrMngNo}

/** [Dp_SQL.xml][egovframework.example.dp.service.impl.DpMapper.selectBnnrDtlServiceList][배너목록][hanq] */
SELECT DTL_SEQ , BNNR_MNG_NO , BNNR_TEXT , IMG_ATTC_FILE , CNNT_URL , SORT_SEQ FROM T_DP_BNNR_DTL WHERE BNNR_MNG_NO = #{bnnrMngNo}
